front.title: NGtrans IPv6 DNS operational requirements and roadmap

abstract.t: This document describes IPv6 DNS operational requirements anddeployment roadmap. It is the result of discussion from members ofthe IPv6, NGtrans, DNSops and DNSext working groups. The DNS islooked as a critical part of the Internet infrastructure and is usedfor much more purposes than name to address resolution. Thus asmooth operation of the DNS is critical in the IPv6 transition.
